# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(tinge VERSION 0.1.0 LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_library(tinge STATIC "")
set_target_properties(tinge PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "tinge")
set_target_properties(tinge PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(tinge PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_options(tinge PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
set_target_properties(tinge PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(tinge PRIVATE cxx_std_11)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(tinge PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(tinge PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(tinge PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET tinge PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(tinge PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(tinge PRIVATE
    src/ColorSpace.cpp
    src/Comparison.cpp
    src/Conversion.cpp
)
